title: Natural Minor Scale
description: Learn the A natural minor scale and its characteristic dark sound.

steps.title: The Natural Minor Scale
steps.description: The natural minor scale has a darker, sadder sound than the major scale. The formula is: W-H-W-W-H-W-W (whole, half, whole, whole, half, whole, whole). A minor is the simplest â€” it uses only white keys: A, B, C, D, E, F, G.

steps.title: Find A
steps.description: Press A4 to start the A natural minor scale.

steps.title: Play A Natural Minor
steps.description: Play all 7 notes ascending: A, B, C, D, E, F, G. All white keys!
steps.hint: Start on A and play all white keys up to G.

steps.title: Play A Minor Chord
steps.description: Play the A minor chord: A, C, E.

steps.title: Play D Minor Chord
steps.description: D minor (D, F, A) is the iv chord in A minor. Play it now.

steps.title: Play E Minor Chord
steps.description: E minor (E, G, B) is the v chord in A minor.
